jasima.core.util

类 XmlUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.util.XmlUtil

  • public class XmlUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods to read and write arbitrary Java objects as xml (xml-Serialization using the xstream library).
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt, 2012-07-13

    • 方法详细资料

      • loadXML

        public static java.lang.Object loadXML(FileFormat format,
                                       java.lang.String xmlString)
        Loads an object from a String containing xml.
        参数:
        xmlString - A String containing xml data.
        返回:
        The object contained in xmlString.
        另请参阅:
        saveXML(FileFormat,Object)

      • loadXML

        public static java.lang.Object loadXML(java.lang.String xmlString)
        Loads an object from a String containing xml. Format is assumed to be the XML bean format produced by jasima gui.
        参数:
        xmlString - A String containing xml data.
        返回:
        The object contained in xmlString.
        另请参阅:
        loadXML(FileFormat,String)

      • loadXML

        public static java.lang.Object loadXML(FileFormat format,
                                       java.io.File f)
        Loads an object from a file.
        参数:
        f - The file to load.
        返回:
        The object contained in f.

      • loadXML

        public static java.lang.Object loadXML(java.io.File f)
        Loads an object from a file. Format is assumed to be the XML bean format produced by jasima gui.
        参数:
        f - The file to load.
        返回:
        The object contained in f.

      • loadXML

        public static java.lang.Object loadXML(FileFormat format,
                                       java.io.Reader r)
        Loads an object from a Reader.
        参数:
        r - Source of the xml.
        返回:
        The object contained in r.

      • loadXML

        public static java.lang.Object loadXML(java.io.Reader r)
        Loads an object from a Reader. Format is assumed to be the XML bean format produced by jasima gui.
        参数:
        r - Source of the xml.
        返回:
        The object contained in r.

      • saveXML

        public static java.lang.String saveXML(FileFormat format,
                                       java.lang.Object o)
        Converts an object into a xml String.
        参数:
        o - The object to convert.
        返回:
        The object serialized to xml.

      • saveXML

        public static void saveXML(FileFormat format,
                           java.lang.Object o,
                           java.io.Writer w)
        Converts an object into xml and writes the result in w.
        参数:
        o - The object to convert.
        w - The output writer.

      • saveXML

        public static void saveXML(FileFormat format,
                           java.lang.Object o,
                           java.io.File f)
        Converts an object into xml and saves the result in a file f.
        参数:
        o - The object to convert.
        f - The output file. This file is overwritten if it already exists.

      • getXStream

        private static com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream getXStream(FileFormat format)
